docs.title: Home
docs.text: Engineer who likes to learn and experiment. Rinse & Repeat :) This site will serve as documentation for my experiments with Garden, Astronomy, Worms among several other things!

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
• Tote bin
  • Worms (Red Wigglers preferred for indoor bins)
  • CardBoard
  • New Paper
  • Coco coir to start with (need only for first time setup). Can be substituted with Dry leaves. I was concerned bringing insects from Outside.

docs.title: Maintenance
docs.text: • Daily: Separate out food scraps (Except Onion, Tomatoes, Lime/Lemons, Citrus fruits, Garlic, Pepper, etc)

docs.title: Process
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Indoor?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Extra Cautious with what you feed...];
  B ---->|No| E[Anything except Meat and Eggs!];
